layer-0.sql: SELECT b.cartodb_id, b.name_1, a.airn as value , b.the_geom_webmercator FROM dom_indicators a join adm1 b on a.codgov::integer=b.codgov::integer WHERE a.airn BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000

WITH p as (SELECT b.cartodb_id, b.name_1, a.airn as value1, airy as value, b.the_geom_webmercator FROM dom_indicators a join adm1 b on a.codgov::integer=b.codgov::integer) select * from p where value1>10000 AND  value >10000

WITH p as (SELECT b.cartodb_id, b.name_1, a.airn as value1, airy as value, b.the_geom_webmercator FROM dom_indicators a join adm1 b on a.codgov::integer=b.codgov::integer WHERE a.airn>30000 ) select 1 cartodb_id, ST_UNION (the_geom_webmercator) as the_geom_webmercator, 'Average' as name_1, avg(value1) as value  from p

layer-0.cartocss: #dom_indicators{polygon-fill: #FFFFB2; polygon-opacity: 0.8; line-color: #FFF; line-width: 0.5; line-opacity: 1; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 7] {polygon-fill: #B10026; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 7] {polygon-fill: #E31A1C; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 3] {polygon-fill: #FC4E2A; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 2] {polygon-fill: #FD8D3C; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 2] {polygon-fill: #FEB24C; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 1] {polygon-fill: #FED976; } #dom_indicators [ value <= 0] {polygon-fill: #FFFFB2; }
layer-0.sql: SELECT b.cartodb_id, b.name_1, a.airy as value1, a.topop as value2, a.airy*1000/a.topop as value , b.the_geom_webmercator FROM dom_indicators a join adm2 b on a.codgov::integer=b.codgov::integer
